plot: Jeong-ho eats only raw foods. His friend Hae-mi can't understand Jeong-ho's eating habits. One afternoon Hae-mi gives him a present - chocolate.
title: Sweet Temptation
plot_es: Jeong-ho eats only raw foods. His friend Hae-mi can't understand Jeong-ho's eating habits. One afternoon Hae-mi gives him a present - chocolate.
plot_en: Jeong-ho eats only raw foods. His friend Hae-mi can't understand Jeong-ho's eating habits. One afternoon Hae-mi gives him a present - chocolate.
